trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event occurs when the selection state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>händelsen inträffar när markeringsstatusen på ett <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>ändringar från markerat till avmarkerade eller avmarkerat till det valda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> will not occur if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>utförs inte om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>är i virtuellt läge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> vars markeringsstatusen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Index för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> vars markeringsstatusen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the item's state has changed to selected; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate the item's state has changed to deselected.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Anger objektets tillstånd har ändrats till valda; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att visa objektets tillstånd har ändrats till avmarkerade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the item's state has changed to selected.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om objektets tillstånd har ändrats till valda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item's state has changed to selected; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the item's state has changed to deselected.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om objektets tillstånd har ändrats till markerad. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> om objektets tillstånd har ändrats till avmarkerade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar objekt vars markeringsstatusen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> vars markeringsstatusen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar index för objektet vars markeringsstatusen har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: Index för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> vars markeringsstatusen har ändrats.
